title: Riot Servers are Really Shitty Tonight
body:
3 or 4 games in a row I've connected perfectly, begun to play for a while then I get disconnected and get up to 1300 ping, it's really great
One of the games we had 7 people in the game lagging, all over 300 ping
Before I'm told my internet is shit, it's not, everything else runs perfectly fine and I'm on the only device using internet

replies.body: Commenting on this to show that there are trending issues with server network lag.  We need to isolate this issue as ISP or server issue?
